CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Intapp_Time_Total_Management__c, "Own it"), ISPICKVAL(Rekoop_Time_Management__c, "Own it - Cloud") ), "Blue", IF( AND( Fresh_Opportunities__c > 0, New_Intapp_Time_Prospect__c="Unengaged Non-Customer" ), "Green-ish", IF( Fresh_Opportunities__c > 0, "Green", IF( AND( Fresh_Opportunities__c = 0, New_Time_Opportunities__c > 0 ), "Amber", " " ))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green-ish: Fresh opportunity in Target Stage Green: Fresh Opportunity Blue: Own TTM or Rekoop TTM Amber: Open Time opportunity that is not fresh
CustomField.label: Time Radar
